name: Wyndham Resort Torquay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Well located hotel, across the road from the beach and 10 minutes walk into the centre of Torquay. Our room was a little disappointing and felt more like a motel room.
reviews.title: Good location and facilities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The facilities at this hotel are good, an indoor lap pool and an outdoor pool with spa. The gym has a good selection of exercise machines and some free weights. We had an evening meal in the restaurant which was good although a little expensive. As we stayed during off-peak the parking was fine, undercover beneath the hotel, however there is limited parking so this can sometimes be an issue.
reviews.title: OK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I rarely have anything negative to say about hotels but i think others may find my review helpful.
reviews.title: Clean & Spacious. Close to Beach.

reviews.text: The best things about this property was out room. We had a 1 bedroom apartment. It was spacious with a seperate bedroom. It had a balcony and kitchen and everything you'd need to stay there comfortably.
reviews.title: nice hotel and great for a conference

reviews.text: Parking is a huge issue. On our second night there we had to park down the street away from the hotel because there are not enough car parks. Not the best scenario but the fact that is was raining made it very annoying. They offer valet which obviously not a lot of people use as half that carpark was empty!!
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I think that once upon a time this was a very grand hotel, it is now a little tired and probably in need of some new and fresher decoration. However, in saying that it is good value for money and is perfectly positioned at the start to The Great Ocean Road. There is plenty of parking available and the rooms were clean and comfortable. It was too cold to swim but I would have loved to as the pool looked very inviting.
reviews.title: Good location to start off on The Great Ocean Road

description: Wyndham Resort Torquay showcases some of the best beach views on Victoria’s Surf Coast.Located at the gateway to the Great Ocean Road, this beautiful resort is right opposite the beach at Zeally Bay and offers panoramic ocean views. The resort features stylish guest rooms and spacious apartments, most with patios or private balconies. Many overlook the swimming pool or the beach, delivering spectacular views.Outstanding facilities, amenities and exceptional service make this resort one of a kind. Facilities include a outdoor resort style swimming pool and spa pool, an indoor heated lap pool, barbecue area, a fully equipped gym and tennis court.The onsite restaurant, Latitude-38 overlooks Zeally Bay and serves world-class cuisine. It features a modern, stylish interior and a balcony for alfresco dining. The ground floor Sand Bar is the perfect place to relax for pre or post dinner drinks. The Day Spa at Wyndham offer a variety of relaxing treatments to make any weekend or Holiday special.
